name: Project C (AgencyAgency)
description:
Thank you for playing the combat demo, please fill out this quick survey below to help the developers!
https://forms.gle/hoaJ9SqP9oamr2Hu5

Known bugs:
- Press "P" if you cannot attack
- Turn on hardware acceleration
- Do not press CTRL + W
- Do not fullscreen game
- It is not recommended to sprint
- Deer sometimes does not heal

Project C is currently in development, and will be a roguelike survival game (Muck-like) that focuses on combat and exploration. The game was designed to better incorporate building into combat, while also providing balanced and engaging cooperative play. Unlike other survival games, cooperative play was the primary consideration in our design, from the weapons to the progression and bosses. We hope you will follow us along our development journey!
